description: "The following illustrations are from photographs taken by Mr. Humphrey Lloyd Hime ... or from sketches by Mr. John Fleming ..."--P. [xix] of v. 1, and repeated on p. [xv] of v. 2
The plates (chromoxylographs) are signed: Printed by Spottiswoode and Co.; the maps are variously signed: Engraved by Edwd. Weller; John Arrowsmith litho 1860; drawn by John Arrowsmith
Publisher's advertisement on p. [495]-[496] of v. 1 (wanting in SCNHRB c. 2)

SCNHRB c. 1 (39088007209406; 39088007209414) has bookplate: Presented by the Library of Parliament, Canada, forwarded by Edward G. Allen, Public Library Agency ... Covent Garden, London; stamp on verso of t.p.'s: Smithsonian Institution National Museum Jul. 22 1913; accession no. 227839 (for both v.)
SCNHRB c. 1 has blue buckram library binding with gilt-lettered spine
SCNHRB c. 2 (39088010380251; 39088010380392) has penciled autograph of F.V. Hayden on t.p. of v. 1; stamp on t.p.'s: Bureau of Ethnology Library 1894; accession nos. 3861-3862
SCNHRB c. 2 has stamp on p. [2] (2nd group) of v. 1: withdrawn Smithsonian Institution Libraries [later reinstated]
SCNHRB c. 2 has green buckram library binding with gilt-lettered spine; the large folded maps on brittle paper are in poor condition
publisher: London : Longman, Green, Longman, and Roberts
possible-copyright-status: Not in copyright. The BHL knows of no copyright restrictions on this item.
